Template Download Button Logic

The template should show download buttons based on this logic:

// iOS Button Logic
finalIosUrl = config?.website?.ios_app_url || fallbackIosUrl || originalAppUrl
Result: https://apps.apple.com/us/app/bbc-world-news-stories/id364147881?uo=4
‚Üí iOS button will SHOW
// Android Button Logic
finalAndroidUrl = config?.website?.android_app_url || fallbackAndroidUrl || originalAppUrl
Result: https://apps.apple.com/us/app/bbc-world-news-stories/id364147881?uo=4
‚Üí Android button will NOT SHOW

üîÑ Toggle Implementation Status

New toggle functionality allows sections to be enabled/disabled:

‚úÖ Sections with Toggles
  • ‚Ä¢ FAQ Section (config.sections.faq)
  • ‚Ä¢ Contact Form (config.sections.contactForm)
  • ‚Ä¢ Privacy Policy (config.sections.privacyPage)
  • ‚Ä¢ Terms of Service (config.sections.termsPage)
üìå Always Active Sections
  • ‚Ä¢ Reviews Section (always visible)
  • ‚Ä¢ Screenshots Gallery (always visible)
  • ‚Ä¢ App Information (always visible)
  • ‚Ä¢ Download Buttons (always visible)
Important: Content vs Display
When a section is disabled, the content is still saved in config.content but won't display on the website. This allows users to toggle sections on/off without losing their content.

Website Config Only (Key for App Store Links)

üîß Debug Tips

App Store Links Issues

  • ‚Ä¢ Check if config.website.ios_app_url is set
  • ‚Ä¢ Check if config.website.android_app_url is set
  • ‚Ä¢ Verify URLs are valid (apps.apple.com or play.google.com)
  • ‚Ä¢ Ensure template receives updated config after URL changes

Section Toggle Issues

  • ‚Ä¢ Check if config.sections.faq is true/false
  • ‚Ä¢ Check if config.sections.contactForm is true/false
  • ‚Ä¢ Check if config.sections.privacyPage is true/false
  • ‚Ä¢ Check if config.sections.termsPage is true/false
  • ‚Ä¢ Content exists but section disabled = content saved but hidden
Toggle Logic:
Enabled Section: Content appears on website | Disabled Section: Content saved but hidden | Always Visible: Reviews, Screenshots, App Info
Keyboard Shortcuts:
Ctrl/Cmd + E: Expand All | Ctrl/Cmd + Q: Collapse All | Ctrl/Cmd + D: Download JSON

üîç Debug Template | Comprehensive Data Inspector | Toggle Support: ‚úÖ Active

Use this template to debug data flow issues, verify template inputs, and test section toggles
